00008 #include "CAudioSettings.h"
00009 #include "../../sdl/CInput.h"
00010 #include "../../sdl/CVideoDriver.h"
00011 #include "../../sdl/CSettings.h"
00012 #include "../../sdl/sound/CSound.h"
00013 #include "../../hqp/CMusic.h"
00014 #include "../../StringUtils.h"

00016 #define SAFE_DELETE(x) if(x) { delete x; x = NULL; }
00017 
00018 CAudioSettings::CAudioSettings(Uint8 dlg_theme, CExeFile &ExeFile) :
00019 CBaseMenu(dlg_theme),
00020 m_ExeFile(ExeFile),
00021 mp_VolumeMenu(NULL),
00022 m_must_restart_sounddriver(false)
00023 {
00024  m_current = -1;
00025  
00026  mp_Dialog = new CDialog(20, 6, INPUT_MODE_OPTION,m_dlg_theme);
00027  
00028  m_Rate = g_pSound->getAudioSpec().freq;
00029  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 1, "Rate: " + itoa(m_Rate) +" kHz");
00030  if( m_Rate == 11025 ) mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(0)->m_Option->m_value = 1;
00031  else if( m_Rate == 22050 ) mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(0)->m_Option->m_value = 2;
00032  else if( m_Rate == 44100 ) mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(0)->m_Option->m_value = 3;
00033  else if( m_Rate == 48000 ) mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(0)->m_Option->m_value = 4;
00034  
00035  m_Format = g_pSound->getAudioSpec().format;
00036  std::string buf;
00037  if(m_Format == AUDIO_S16)
00038   buf = "Format: 16 bits";
00039  else
00040   buf = "Format: 8 bits";
00041  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 2, buf);
00042  if( m_Format == AUDIO_U8 ) mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(1)->m_Option->m_value = 1;
00043  else if( m_Format == AUDIO_S16 ) mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(1)->m_Option->m_value = 2;
00044  
00045  m_Mode = g_pSound->getAudioSpec().channels - 1;
00046  buf = "Mode: ";
00047  buf += m_Mode ? "Stereo": "Mono";
00048  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 3, buf);
00049  mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(2)->m_Option->m_value = g_pSound->getAudioSpec().channels;
00050  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 4, "Adjust Volume");
00051  
00052 }
00053 
00054 void CAudioSettings::processSpecific()
00055 {
00056  if(!m_suspended)
00057  {
00058   std::string buf;
00059   
00060   if( m_mustclose )
00061   {
00062    CSettings Settings;
00063    bool wasPlaying = g_pMusicPlayer->playing();
00064 
00065    // Check if the music is playing, stop it and restart it, if necessary
00066    if(m_Rate != g_pSound->getAudioSpec().freq or m_Format != g_pSound->getAudioSpec().format or m_Mode != g_pSound->getAudioSpec().channels - 1 )
00067    {
00068     g_pMusicPlayer->stop();
00069 
00070     // Close the sound driver
00071     g_pSound->destroy();
00072     g_pSound->setSoundmode(m_Rate, m_Mode ? true : false, m_Format);
00073     m_must_restart_sounddriver |= true;
00074    }
00075 
00076    Settings.saveDrvCfg();
00077 
00078    if(m_must_restart_sounddriver)
00079    {
00080     // Reload the sounds effects, so they work with the new format
00081     g_pSound->init();
00082 
00083     g_pSound->loadSoundData(m_ExeFile);
00084 
00085     // Reload the music if was playing before we changed the settings
00086     if(wasPlaying)
00087     {
00088      g_pMusicPlayer->reload();
00089      g_pMusicPlayer->play();
00090     }
00091    }
00092   }
00093   
00094   if( m_current != mp_Dialog->getSelection())
00095   {
00096    m_current = mp_Dialog->getSelection();
00097   }
00098   else if( m_current != NO_SELECTION)
00099   {
00100    if(m_current == 0)
00101    {
00102     mp_Dialog->m_min = 1;
00103     mp_Dialog->m_max = 4;
00104     setValues(0, mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(0)->m_Option->m_value);
00105     mp_Dialog->setObjectText(0, "Rate: " + itoa(m_Rate) + " kHz");
00106    }
00107   }
00108   
00109   if( m_selection != NO_SELECTION )
00110   {
00111    if(m_selection == 0)
00112    {
00113     mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(0)->m_Option->m_value += 1;
00114     if(mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(0)->m_Option->m_value > mp_Dialog->m_max)
00115     mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(0)->m_Option->m_value = 1;
00116     m_must_restart_sounddriver |= true;
00117    }
00118    else if(m_selection == 1)
00119    {
00120     if( m_Format == AUDIO_S16 ) m_Format = AUDIO_U8;
00121     else if( m_Format == AUDIO_U8 ) m_Format = AUDIO_S16;
00122     buf = "Format: ";
00123     buf += (m_Format == AUDIO_S16) ? "16 bits" : "8 bits";
00124     mp_Dialog->setObjectText(1, buf);
00125     m_must_restart_sounddriver |= true;
00126    }
00127    else if(m_selection == 2)
00128    {
00129     m_Mode = !m_Mode;
00130     buf = "Mode: ";
00131     buf += m_Mode ? "Stereo" : "Mono";
00132     mp_Dialog->setObjectText(2, buf);
00133     m_must_restart_sounddriver |= true;
00134    }
00135    else if(m_selection == 3)
00136    {
00137     mp_VolumeMenu = new CVolumeSettings(m_dlg_theme);
00138     m_suspended = true;
00139    }
00140    m_selection = -1;
00141   }
00142  }
00143  else
00144  {
00145   mp_VolumeMenu->processCommon();
00146   mp_VolumeMenu->processSpecific();
00147   mp_VolumeMenu->postProcess();
00148   
00149   if(mp_VolumeMenu->mustClose())
00150   {
00151    SAFE_DELETE(mp_VolumeMenu);
00152    m_suspended = false;
00153   }
00154  }
00155 }
00156 
00157 void CAudioSettings::setValues(int item, int value)
00158 {
00159  if(item == 0)
00160  {
00161   switch(value)
00162   {
00163    case 1: m_Rate = 11025; break;
00164    case 2: m_Rate = 22050; break;
00165    case 3: m_Rate = 44100; break;
00166    case 4: m_Rate = 48000; break;
00167   }
00168  }
00169 }
00170 
00171 CAudioSettings::~CAudioSettings() {
00172  if(mp_Dialog) delete mp_Dialog;
00173  mp_Dialog = NULL;
00174 }
